content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_granite
inventory=[{"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_sapling", "quantity": 24, "index": 12}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 48, "index": 14}, {"type": "lime_terracotta", "quantity": 13, "index": 25}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 4, "index": 28}, {"type": "blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 20, "index": 30}, {"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 60, "index": 33}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 4, "index": 37}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 21, "index": 40}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 5, "index": 43}]
thought: The first step in crafting polished_granite is to craft quartz from nether_quartz_ore. Therefore, I will smelt the nether_quartz_ore at slot 37 into an empty slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 37 to slot 13 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_granite
inventory=[{"type": "quartz_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_sapling", "quantity": 24, "index": 12}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "salmon", "quantity": 48, "index": 14}, {"type": "lime_terracotta", "quantity": 13, "index": 25}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 4, "index": 28}, {"type": "blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 20, "index": 30}, {"type": "spruce_button", "quantity": 60, "index": 33}, {"type": "nether_quartz_ore", "quantity": 3, "index": 37}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 21, "index": 40}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 5, "index": 43}]

thought: Now that I have crafted the quartz, I need to move it into the crafting grid so that I can craft granite. The first slot in the crafting grid is slot 1, therefore I will move the quartz there.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
act: smelt from slot 37 to slot 15 with quantity 1
